.. :tocdepth: 2

mainframe GUI module
=====================

This GUI module is created using wxUIEditor (https://github.com/KeyWorksRW/wxUiEditor). To make changes to the controls, open the \*.wxui file in the ./dependencies folder with wxUIEditor.

.. automodule:: dependencies.mainframe
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

-----------

   :linenos:
